analysis.headline: Shares Your Info With Affiliates
analysis.quote: We may share personal data with affiliates, meaning an entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with, us.

analysis.headline: Your Data Can Train AI Models
analysis.quote: We do not use Inputs or Suggestions to train our models... unless... (3) youâ€™ve explicitly agreed to their use for such training purposes.

analysis.headline: Collects All Your Inputs
analysis.quote: If you include personal data or reference external content in your Inputs, we will collect that information and it may be reproduced in the Suggestions we provide.

analysis.headline: Your Employer Can Monitor You
analysis.quote: If you're part of a business or enterprise account, administrators may access and manage your use of the Service.

analysis.headline: Vague Data Retention Periods
analysis.quote: The appropriate retention period varies depending on the purpose for which the personal data was collected, its sensitivity, potential risks associated with its use or exposure, and any applicable legal requirements.

analysis.headline: Tracks Your General Location
analysis.quote: we may determine the geographic location from which your device accesses our Service using information such as your IP address.

analysis.headline: Cannot Guarantee Output Correction
analysis.quote: due to the nature of our models, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of Suggestions generated by the Service.

analysis.headline: Your Data Leaves Your Region
analysis.quote: your personal data may be transferred to our United States servers to other countries outside the EEA and the UK.

analysis.headline: Third Parties Have Their Own Rules
analysis.quote: If you choose to interact with these third parties, your personal data may be disclosed to them directly and governed by their own terms and privacy policies.

analysis.headline: No Guaranteed Data Security
analysis.quote: However, please remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure.
